评论详情: I was looking for a self-winding watch that didn't come across one that didn't break the bank until I found this one. My big complaint is that unless you wear it 24/7 it stops running. I had a self-winding watch that my mother purchased for me many many years ago and this was not an issue, why cant they still be made this way? My only other issue is that it is so heavy that it is not that comfortable to wear. I kept it anyway as it looks as if it is well made and I do like its appearance.

类型: Color: Green Dial Silver Tone Band
评论详情: As someone who owns a Rolex Hulk, I can confidently say that while this watch is a bit brighter by comparison, it still offers an exceptional experience. While it may not match the prestige of a Rolex, the craftsmanship and reliability it provides are exceptional, especially considering it costs just 1% of a luxury watch's price. Remarkably, it offers far more than 1% of the value, delivering a sleek design, durable build, and dependable automatic movement. This watch is a testament to the fact that great quality doesn't always come with a hefty price tag, making it a fantastic option for those seeking both style and functionality.
